pageTitle: Public events for November 13, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Public events for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, November 13, 2015:

Ottawa

8:30 p.m.

Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, will address the media on the terrorist attacks in Paris, prior to his departure tonight for the G20 and APEC summits.

MacDonald-Cartier International Airport

Ottawa, Ontario
